dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: 2.8 billion dollars. That's the fine Alibaba from China's State Administration for Market Regulation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: two point eight billion dollars. That's the fine Alibaba from China's State Administration for Market Regulation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, SAMR, right? For that "choose one out of two" policy they had.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, S A M R, right? For that choose one out of two policy they had.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: China's State Administration for Market Regulation (SAMR) said that Alibaba had abused its market dominance when it punished merchants if they didnt sell their merchandise exclusively on its platforms. Since 2015, Alibaba has been punishing merchants if they used rivals sites through a practice dubbed er xuan yi, which means choose one out of two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, the er xuan yi practice, punishing merchants for selling on rival sites.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, the er xuan yi practice, punishing merchants for selling on rival sites.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since 2015, Alibaba has been punishing merchants if they used rivals sites through a practice dubbed er xuan yi, which means choose one out of two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they've been doing it since late 2016, which is a long time to enforce something like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they've been doing it since late twenty sixteen, which is a long time to enforce something like that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Since 2015, Alibaba has been punishing merchants if they used rivals sites through a practice dubbed er xuan yi, which means choose one out of two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Alibaba did accept the penalty, though—said they'd comply with determination in their statement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alibaba did accept the penalty, though-said they'd comply with determination in their statement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibaba accepts the penalty with sincerity and will ensure its compliance with determination.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But this isn't just about the fine, is it? It's part of a bigger crackdown on Jack Ma's empire.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But this isn't just about the fine, is it? It's part of a bigger crackdown on Jack Ma's empire.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. Remember when Ant Group's IPO got halted right before trading?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. Remember when Ant Group's I P O got halted right before trading?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In November, Chinas regulators abruptly halted the initial public offering of Ant Group, Alibabas fintech affiliate, just days before its shares were expected to begin trading in Shanghai and Hong Kong.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that was huge. Regulators forced them to restructure like a traditional bank.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that was huge. Regulators forced them to restructure like a traditional bank.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The government has forced it to restructure to adhere to the same rules and capital requirements that banks have to follow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Jack Ma himself, he kinda vanished after that speech criticizing China's financial system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Jack Ma himself, he kinda vanished after that speech criticizing China's financial system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ma disappeared from public view for nearly three months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he called it a "pawnshop mentality," which, uh, didn't go over well clearly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he called it a pawnshop mentality, which, uh, didn't go over well clearly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinese banks had been operating with a pawnshop mentality, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He was out of sight for months, only reappearing in a short video in January.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He was out of sight for months, only reappearing in a short video in January.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ma disappeared from public view for nearly three months. He finally re-emerged in January by making an appearance in a 50-second video.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So this fine feels like another step in tightening control over big tech dominance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So this fine feels like another step in tightening control over big tech dominance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Alibaba's holding a conference call tomorrow, Hong Kong time, to address it all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alibaba's holding a conference call tomorrow, Hong Kong time, to address it all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibaba said it will hold a conference call on Monday at 8:00 a.m. Hong Kong time to address questions about the regulators decision.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I'm curious how they'll reassure investors after all this regulatory pressure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm curious how they'll reassure investors after all this regulatory pressure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Me too. It's a major moment for their compliance and public image moving forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Me too. It's a major moment for their compliance and public image moving forward.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely a sign that even giants can't avoid scrutiny when regulators decide to step in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely a sign that even giants can't avoid scrutiny when regulators decide to step in.
